user_prompt: I want to survey employee satisfaction with remote work policies, including work-life balance, productivity tools, communication, and overall job satisfaction.

structure.title: Remote Work Policy Employee Satisfaction Survey
structure.description: This survey aims to understand your experiences with our remote work policies and identify areas for improvement. Your honest feedback is valuable and will help us create a better work environment.

questions.question: How satisfied are you with the flexibility offered by our remote work policy?
To what extent has remote work improved your work-life balance?
How effective are the productivity tools provided for remote work (e.g., software, equipment)?
How satisfied are you with the communication channels and frequency of communication with your team and manager while working remotely?
How would you rate the overall support provided by the company for successful remote work?
How often do you experience feelings of isolation or disconnect while working remotely?

On a scale of 1 to 5 (1 being strongly disagree and 5 being strongly agree), how much do you agree with the statement: 'I feel equally connected to my team while working remotely as I did in the office.'
What is your overall job satisfaction while working remotely?
What is the biggest challenge you face while working remotely?

user_prompt: I want to survey employee satisfaction with remote work policies, including work-life balance, productivity tools, communication, and overall job satisfaction.

structure.title: Remote Work Policy Employee Satisfaction Survey
structure.description: This survey aims to understand your experiences with our remote work policies and identify areas for improvement. Your honest feedback is valuable and will help us shape a better remote work environment.

questions.question: How satisfied are you with the flexibility offered by our remote work policy regarding your work schedule?
How would you rate your work-life balance while working remotely?
How effective are the productivity tools provided for remote work (e.g., software, hardware)?
How satisfied are you with the communication tools and methods used for remote collaboration (e.g., email, instant messaging, video conferencing)?
How frequently do you experience feelings of isolation or disconnect while working remotely?
Rate your overall job satisfaction while working remotely.
How would you rate the level of support provided by your manager for remote work?
What is your preferred method for receiving feedback from your manager?
Do you have any suggestions for improving our remote work policies or support systems?
options: Yes, please see the comments section below

user_prompt: I want to survey employee satisfaction with remote work policies, including work-life balance, productivity tools, communication, and overall job satisfaction.

structure.title: Remote Work Policy Employee Satisfaction Survey
structure.description: This survey aims to understand your experiences with our remote work policies and identify areas for improvement. Your honest feedback is valuable and will help us enhance our support for remote employees.

questions.question: How satisfied are you with the flexibility offered by our remote work policy regarding your work schedule?
How effectively does our remote work policy support a healthy work-life balance?
Rate your satisfaction with the productivity tools and technologies provided for remote work.
How would you rate the effectiveness of communication tools and methods used for remote collaboration?
How frequently do you experience feelings of isolation or disconnect while working remotely?
To what extent do you feel supported by your manager and team while working remotely?
How satisfied are you with your overall job satisfaction while working remotely?
What is your preferred method of communication for team projects and daily updates?
What is the biggest challenge you face while working remotely?

user_prompt: I want to survey employee satisfaction with remote work policies, including work-life balance, productivity tools, communication, and overall job satisfaction.

structure.title: Remote Work Policy Employee Satisfaction Survey
structure.description: This survey aims to understand your experiences with our remote work policies and identify areas for improvement. Your honest feedback is highly valued and will remain confidential.

questions.question: How satisfied are you with the flexibility offered by our remote work policy regarding your work schedule?
How effective are the communication tools provided (e.g., email, instant messaging, video conferencing) in supporting remote collaboration?
To what extent has remote work improved your work-life balance?
How would you rate the availability and reliability of the technology and productivity tools provided for remote work?
How satisfied are you with the level of support provided by IT and HR for remote work-related issues?
How often do you feel overwhelmed or burnt out due to remote work?
How would you rate your overall job satisfaction while working remotely?
What is your preferred method of communication with your manager or team for daily updates?
Do you feel adequately connected to your team and colleagues while working remotely?

user_prompt: I want to survey employee satisfaction with remote work policies, including work-life balance, productivity tools, communication, and overall job satisfaction.

structure.title: Remote Work Policy Employee Satisfaction Survey
structure.description: This survey aims to understand your experiences with our remote work policies and identify areas for improvement. Your honest feedback is valuable and will help us enhance our support for remote employees.

questions.question: How satisfied are you with the flexibility offered by our remote work policy regarding your work schedule?
How effective are the communication tools provided (e.g., Slack, email, video conferencing) in supporting remote collaboration?
To what extent do you feel that working remotely positively impacts your work-life balance?
How satisfied are you with the IT support provided for your remote work setup?
Rate your overall productivity while working remotely compared to working in the office.
How satisfied are you with the availability of the necessary technology and tools for your remote work?
How frequently do you feel overwhelmed or stressed due to challenges related to remote work?
How would you rate your overall job satisfaction while working remotely?
What is the biggest challenge you face while working remotely?
